data.name: Death Duel VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Death Duel VR Demo
It is one on one online sword duel game in VR.
Major Features include:
  • Real Physics Based Weapon Collision For Multiplayer (No Cool-Down Mechanic)
  • Full-body physics for game character
  • Sectional Damages - each limb can be crippled with physical effect
  • Vast variety of medieval weapons to choose from
  • Different sized weapons have different feeling of weight

What included in this Demo

  • Three maps
  • Weapons up to Tier 3
  • One character

data.short_description: A VR Multiplayer Sword Combat Game Based On Real PhysicsChallenge Your Friend In A VR Sword Duel Now!
